Source.Name: msedit
Source.Summary: Microsoft Edit - A simple editor for simple needs
Source.Description: This editor pays homage to the classic MS-DOS Editor, but with a modern interface and input controls similar to VS Code. The goal is to provide an accessible editor that even users largely unfamiliar with terminals can easily use.
